description: DOI of the work.
name: doi

description: URL form of the work's DOI.
name: url

description: Abstract as a JSON string or a JATS XML snippet encoded into a JSON string.
name: abstract
accepted
description: Date on which a work was accepted, after being submitted, during a submission process.
Other identifiers for the work provided by the depositing member
name: alternative_id

fields.description: Identifier of the clinical trial.

fields.name: registry
fields.description: DOI of the clinical trial regsitry that assigned the trial number.

fields.name: type
fields.description: One of preResults, results or postResults

name: container_title
description: Full titles of the containing work (usually a book or journal)

name: content_created
description: Full titles of the containing work (usually a book or journal)
Information on domains that support Crossmark for this work.
name: content_domain
created
description: Date on which the DOI was first registered.
description NA
name: degree
deposited
description: Date on which the work metadata was most recently updated.

fields.name: orcid
fields.description: URL-form of an ORCID identifier

fields.name: authenticated_orcid
fields.description: If true, record owner asserts that the ORCID user completed ORCID OAuth authentication.

fields.name: doi
fields.description: Optional Open Funder Registry DOI uniquely identifing the funding body (http://www.crossref.org/fundingdata/registry.html)

fields.name: award
fields.description: Award number(s) for awards given by the funding body.

fields.name: doi_asserted_by
fields.description: Either crossref or publisher

fields.name: name
fields.description: Funding body primary name

description: Group title for posted content.
name: group_title
indexed
description: Date on which the work metadata was most recently indexed. Re-indexing does not imply a metadata change, see deposited for the most recent metadata change date.
Count of inbound references deposited with Crossref.
name: is_referenced_by_count

description: Date on which content was published.
name: isbn_type

description: List of ISSNs with ISSN type information

fields.name: type
fields.description: ISSN type, can either be print ISSN or electronic ISSN.

fields.name: value
fields.description: ISSN value

name: issn_type

description: Issue number of an article's journal.
name: issue
issued
description: Earliest of published-print and published-online

fields.name: published_print
fields.description: Date on which the work was published in print.

fields.name: published_online
fields.description: Date on which the work was published online.

fields.name: url
fields.description: Link to a web page describing this license

fields.name: content_version
fields.description: Either vor (version of record,) am (accepted manuscript,) tdm (text and data mining) or unspecified.

fields.name: delay_in_days
fields.description: Number of days between the publication date of the work and the start date of this license.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date on which this license begins to take effect

description: URLs to full-text locations.

fields.name: url
fields.description: Direct link to a full-text download location.

fields.name: content_type
fields.description: Content type (or MIME type) of the full-text object.

fields.name: content_version
fields.description: Either vor (version of record,) am (accepted manuscript) or unspecified.

fields.name: intended_application
fields.description: Either text-mining, similarity-checking or unspecified.

name: link

description: Member identifier of the form http://id.crossref.org/member/MEMBER_ID
name: member

description: Work titles in the work's original publication language.
name: original_title

description: Pages numbers of an article within its journal.
name: page
posted
description: Date on which posted content was made available online.
DOI prefix identifier of the form http://id.crossref.org/prefix/DOI_PREFIX.
name: prefix

description: Date on which content was published.
name: published
published_online
description: Date on which the work was published online.

name: published_print
description: Date on which the work was published in print.
Name of work's publisher.
name: publisher

description: Location of work's publisher
name: publisher_location

description: List of references made by the work

fields.description: One of crossref or publisher.

fields.name: issn_type

name: reference

name: references_count

description: Relations to other works.
name: relation

description: Abbreviated titles of the containing work.
name: short_container_title

description: Short or abbreviated work titles
name: short_title

description: Currently always Crossref.
name: source

description: Subject category names, a controlled vocabulary from Sci-Val. Available for most journal articles
name: subject

description: Work subtitles, including original language and translated.
name: subtitle
title
description: Work titles, including translated titles.

name: type

fields.name: doi
fields.description: DOI of the updated work.

fields.description: A display-friendly label for the update type.

fields.description: The type of update, for example retraction or correction.
